(NOTE:  RAC would start.  with ./RAStart.sh but starting the V51 server in profile fails with RAC failing to connect.  )
Adding Kristine to the cc: list.
Adding Joseph to the cc: list.

Kristine, which JDK are you using when running SetConfig.sh? Can you echo your PATH environment? It seems that it was running a JDK which does not have the JAXP parser. If that's true, please use JDK 1.4.2 or higher.

From the error it shows that an unsupported java version is being used:

javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory not found in [file:../lib/config.jar,
file:../lib/config.nl1.jar, file:../lib/config.nl2.jar,
file:../lib/config.nl2a.jar, file:/usr/share/java/libgcj-3.4.5.jar, file:./,
core:/]

The SetConfig script has to be run with a 1.4.2 or later JRE. The error above shows that the system JRE (/usr/share/java) is being picked up.

traces.message: javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory not found in [file:../lib/config.jar, file:../lib/config.nl1.jar, file:../lib/config.nl2.jar, file:../lib/config.nl2a.jar, file:/usr/share/java/libgcj-3.4.5.jar, file:./, core:/]
